title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 May 09 FR [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Friday, 09 May 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Friday, May 9 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Infowars Nighty News anchor, David Knight, covers the latest socialist redistribution rhetoric issued by the Pope, the FCC on net neutrality and the free market versus oligarchy, the ongoing dictatorial saga at the Albuquerque city council, and the latest on Ukraine and the House of the Trade Unions fire and the possibility of such a scenario unfolding in the U.S. 

On today's worldwide broadcast, David talks with renowned international author and activist Alice Walker about the creative process and other topics. Ms. Walker is the author of numerous books, including The Color Purple, You Can't Keep a Good Woman Down, and We Are the Ones We Have Been Waiting for: Inner Light in a Time of Darkness.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
